content.raw:
when I gave the yellow submarine's `spinning_joint` a high torque, e.g. 5000, it went forward but became unstable and gazebo eventually crashed with this error:

~~~
***** Internal Program Error - assertion (cosAlpha <= 1) failed in virtual void gazebo::LiftDragPlugin::OnUpdate():
/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo2/plugins/LiftDragPlugin.cc(191): cosAlpha greater than domain for arccos!
~~~

Maybe I'm doing something I'm not supposed to? but it would nice to prevent the crash
content.html:
when I gave the yellow submarine's spinning_joint a high torque, e.g. 5000, it went forward but became unstable and gazebo eventually crashed with this error:

***** Internal Program Error - assertion (cosAlpha <= 1) failed in virtual void gazebo::LiftDragPlugin::OnUpdate():
/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo2/plugins/LiftDragPlugin.cc(191): cosAlpha greater than domain for arccos!

Maybe I'm doing something I'm not supposed to? but it would nice to prevent the crash
